instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME OVERHAUL: Completely remove the dark mode 'QuickSlot' theme. Replace with 'Rezvo' Light Theme.
2. FONTS: Install 'Fraunces' for Headings and 'Outfit' for Subheadings. Keep 'Inter' for body.
3. HERO SECTION: Must use a large rounded container (rounded-b-[3rem] or floating rounded-3xl) with the 'hero_hairdresser' or 'hero_pt' image.
4. BUTTONS: All buttons must be PILL SHAPED (rounded-full). No sharp corners.
5. COLORS: Use Cream (#FDFBF7) as the main background. Do not use pure white for the page background.
6. TRUST: Add a 'Trusted by' section immediately after the hero with the Which? and FSCS style badges (use text or generic icons if actual logos are tricky, but aim for the 'Trust Badge' look).
7. MOCKUPS: Use the iPhone mockup image to show the 'App' interface.
8. COPY: Use British English (Colour, Centre, Programme). Tone: Friendly, helpful, no jargon.
9. SHADCN: Customize all Shadcn components to match the rounded-3xl radius and cream/teal palette.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
